low.message: Your sleep duration is too short. Aim for 7-9 hours.

high.message: You may be oversleeping. Maintain 7-9 hours.

screen_time.message: Reduce screen time before bed to improve sleep quality.

caffeine.after_6pm: Avoid caffeine after 6 PM to prevent sleep disturbances.

wake_ups.message: Frequent wake-ups indicate poor sleep quality. Improve bedtime habits.

stress.high: High stress can affect sleep. Practice relaxation techniques.
